fixes.name: Delta -25 T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustomDate,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA_25],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = EndDateParam,
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA_25],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF logic to nested DAX IFs. Parameters were mapped to SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]). All column references were rewritten to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName]. The expression returns DELTA_25 when the date conditions match, otherwise 0.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[End Date]); per rules, any calculation using parameters must be implemented as a measure.
